original_text: In his right hand he held seven stars, from his mouth came a sharp two-edged sword, and his face was like the sun shining in full strength.
korean_text: 그의 오른손에 일곱 별이 있고 그의 입에서 좌우에 날선 검이 나오고 그 얼굴은 해가 힘있게 비치는 것 같더라

sentences.original_text: In his right hand he held seven stars
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 오른손에 일곱 별을 쥐고 있었으며

sentences.original_text: from his mouth came a sharp two-edged sword
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 입에서는 날카로운 양날 검이 나왔으며

sentences.original_text: and his face was like the sun
